parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical"
    savedqueryid="00000000-0000-0000-00aa-000010001001" distinct="true" no-lock="false">
    <entity name="account">
        <attribute name="emailaddress1" />
        <attribute name="accountid" />
        <filter type="and">
            <condition attribute="emailaddress1" operator="not-null" />
            <filter type="or">
                <condition attribute="revops_clearbitenrichedat" operator="null" />
                <condition attribute="revops_clearbitenrichedat" operator="olderthan-x-months"
                    value="1" />
            </filter>
        </filter>
    </entity>
</fetch>

Get_channel.description: GICS numeric codes are mapped to standard industry definitions in the revops_gicsmapping table.

Enrich_Account.description: Account table does not have country, state/province fields as lookups.
